mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_table_id AS "orderTable.id", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.method AS "method", a.account AS "account", a.amount AS "amount", a.bank AS "bank", a.expire AS "expire", a.fee AS "fee", a.operator AS "operator", a.payer AS "payer", a.payment_date AS "paymentDate", a.payment_method AS "paymentMethod", a.payment_plugin_id AS "paymentPluginId", a.payment_no AS "paymentNo", a.status AS "status", a.type AS "type", a.user_name AS "userName", a.member AS "member", a.exception_remarks AS "exceptionRemarks", a.is_remarks AS "isRemarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_table_payment( id, order_table_id, order_no, method, account, amount, bank, expire, fee, operator, payer, payment_date, payment_method, payment_plugin_id, payment_no, status, type, user_name, member, exception_remarks, is_remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderTable.id}, #{orderNo}, #{method}, #{account}, #{amount}, #{bank}, #{expire}, #{fee}, #{operator}, #{payer}, #{paymentDate}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentPluginId}, #{paymentNo}, #{status}, #{type}, #{userName}, #{member}, #{exceptionRemarks}, #{isRemarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_table_payment SET order_table_id = #{orderTable.id}, order_no = #{orderNo}, method = #{method}, account = #{account}, amount = #{amount}, bank = #{bank}, expire = #{expire}, fee = #{fee}, operator = #{operator}, payer = #{payer}, payment_date = #{paymentDate}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, payment_plugin_id = #{paymentPluginId}, payment_no = #{paymentNo}, status = #{status}, type = #{type}, user_name = #{userName}, member = #{member}, exception_remarks = #{exceptionRemarks}, is_remarks = #{isRemarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
